text: Tara pichata sihamte yetiya taka lai ga’la, arau taka kumraara majata niksepa karaibalai ekamata ha’la, arau (tetiya) ami tara (i'uchuphara) ocarata ahi praerana karai jana'i dilo ye, ‘arasye tumi sihamtaka (bharaisyatata) sihamtara e'i karma samparke janaba; athaca sihamte seya upalabdhi karaiba noraaraiba’
